Source: Other constructions need to be disassembled first.

Save game data incompatible with this version of the mod has been detected. Please start a new campaign or revert the update to continue playing.

Use the "Restart" option in the pause menu or the "Wipe save data" in the admin menu to restart.
Gives access to weapons and ammunitions belonging to the resistance. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: 可以使用补给购买抵抗组织的武器和弹药。

Source: Gives access to weapons and ammunitions provided by the allied faction. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: 可以使用补给购买盟军提供的武器和弹药。

Source: Place it in a good observation spot.
Translation: 选择一个良好的观察点放置。

Source: Gain access to a resistance officer being present on site.
Translation: 获得抵抗军官在现场的权限。

Source: Gives access to uniforms and other equipment belonging to the resistance. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: 可以使用补给购买抵抗组织的制服及其他装备。

Source: Gives access to uniforms and other equipment provided by the allied faction. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: 可以使用补给购买盟军提供的制服及其他装备。

Source: Allows assigning two ground vehicles to prevent them from being lost, and enables retrieving them from far away.
Translation: 可指派两辆地面载具防止丢失，并可从远处取回。

Source: Allows assigning a single ground vehicle to prevent it from being lost, and enables retrieving it from far away.
Translation: 可指派一辆地面载具防止丢失，并可从远处取回。

Source: Service helipad allows to assign a single helicopter and enables helicopter refueling and repairing. Can be constructed only in airbases.
Translation: 服务停机坪允许指派一架直升机，并可加油与维修。只能建在空军基地。

Source: Helipad allows to assign a single helicopter, which protects it from being lost and enables retrieving it from far away. Basic version without refueling or repairing abilities.
Translation: 允许指派一架直升机，可防止丢失，并可远程取回。基础版不提供加油和维修功能。

Source: Provides living space for a few soldiers that can be recruited.
Translation: 为少量士兵提供住宿空间。

Source: Medical tent improves injury regeneration and allows to purchase medical goods using supplies.
Translation: 提高伤势恢复速度，并可使用补给购买医疗物资。

Source: Send a message over long distance.
Complete mortar emplacement. Projectiles can be purchased using supplies.
Translation: 完整迫击炮阵地。弹药可用补给购买。

Source: Allows to store 900 supplies. First one can be constructed for free.
Translation: 可存放900单位补给，第一个可免费建造。

Source: Due to missing modding features, the single player and local hosting experience is unavailable on console systems. We suggest setting up a private dedicated server or joining a public one.
Translation: 由于缺少模组功能，单人和本地托管在主机平台不可用。我们建议搭建私人专用服务器或加入公共服务器。

Source:
Restored objects may collide with constructions or vehicles left in place of destroyed objects, causing undesired effects. This is an experimental feature and it is recommended to back up your save.

Once you confirm this action, you have to force save and restart the server for the changes to take effect.
Translation:
恢复的物体可能会与替代被摧毁物体位置上的建筑或车辆发生碰撞,从而导致意外效果。这是一个实验性功能,建议先备份您的存档。

一旦您确认此操作,必须强制保存并重启服务器。才能使更改生效

Source: Forced save will perform entire save in a single operation, which may block the server on large maps and with a lot of data. This may cause remote players, including you, to lose connection. This does not affect the save operation itself.
Translation: 强制保存将以单次操作执行完整存档，在大型地图和大量数据时可能阻塞服务器。这可能导致包括你在内的远程玩家断线，但不会影响保存操作本身。

Source:
Are you sure to wipe the campaign save data? After proceeding the scenario will automatically restart.

WARNING: THIS OPERATION CANNOT BE REVERTED. YOU WILL LOSE ALL PROGRESS.
Translation:
你确定要清除战役存档吗？操作后场景将自动重启。

警告：此操作无法撤销。你将失去所有进度。

Source: Used to identify dead bodies found on the battlefield.
Translation: 用于识别战场上发现的尸体

Source: Your clothes are bloodied. Wearing them breaks your disguise and makes you attract enemy attention. You should change your clothes or go for a swim.
Translation: 你的衣服沾满了血。穿上它们会暴露伪装，引来敌人注意。你应该换衣服或去游泳。

Source: Your clothes have been cleaned. Wearing them will not make you suspicious anymore.
Translation: 你的衣服已经清洗干净。穿上它们不会再引起怀疑。

Source: You will be treated as a combatant when openly carrying weapons or wearing combatant attire. Watch out, as you may become wanted if enemies see you.
Translation: 当公开携带武器或穿着战斗服时，你将被视为战斗员。注意，如果敌人看到你，你可能会被通缉。

Source: You are now wanted by the enemy. Hide in a safe place and remain out of sight for some time to lose the heat.
Translation: 你现在已被敌人通缉。躲到安全地点，暂时保持隐蔽以降低热度。

Source: Set to 0% to remove wanted status.
Translation: 设为 0% 可清除通缉状态

Source: Despite best efforts and heroic fight, %1 has failed to liberate %2. %3 forces are here to stay for a long time. Next time pay more attention to population support and logistics of your revolution. No military effort in history succeeded without these elements.
Translation: 尽管付出最大努力和英勇奋战，%1未能解放%2.%3势力将长期占据此地。下次请更多关注民众支持和革命的后勤保障。历史上没有军事行动能在缺少这些元素的情况下成功。

Source: Great job! Thanks to the relentless effort made by %1, the population of %2 will no longer be opressed by %3 forces. These heroic acts will be remembered by many generations to come.
Translation: 干得好！多亏%1的不懈努力，%2的民众将不再受%3势力压迫。这些英雄事迹将被后代铭记。

Source: Use this to wake up incapacitated persons. Can be also self administered.
Translation: 用此唤醒失去意识的人，也可自用。

Source: One time use injector with a dose of epinephrine.
Translation: 一次性注射器，含一剂肾上腺素。

Source:
Different types of armories can be built, depending on the operating base type:
- Allied armory is available at military bases and offers weapons and ammunition of your supporting faction.
- Field armory is available at FOBs and offers weapons and ammunition of the player faction.
Armories allow the purchase of weapons and ammunition using resources stored at the base.
Command post enables you to have a resistance officer on site, allowing you to hand in dogtags, take posters or missions in your operating base, without the need to travel to a hideout.
Equipment stores allow you to purchase uniforms and non-lethal equipment using resources stored at the base.

Different types of stores can be built, depending on the operating base type:
- Allied equipment store is available at military bases and offers equipment of your supporting faction.
- Field equipment store is available at FOBs and offers equipment of the player faction.

Fast travel is available only to player-controlled operating bases. It is more expensive than public transport, but it can be performed from any location, even far away from roads and infrastructure. You cannot fast travel while being wanted, but you don't have to appear as a civilian.
To use fast travel, you need to open your map and select the fast travel icon from the tool picker in the upper-left corner of the screen.
Helipads offer a single parking spot to which helicopters can be assigned, and otherwise they are identical in functionality to garages.
Additionally to regular helipads, military bases allow to construct a service helipad, which can be used to repair helicopters.

Medical tents offer faster regeneration for freedom fighters residing inside. They are also a source for medical items such as bandages or epinephrine, which can be obtained by spending resources at the tent.
Translation: 医疗帐篷可以为驻扎在其中的自由战士提供更快的生命回复。它们也是获取医疗物品的来源，例如绷带或肾上腺素，可通过在帐篷花费资源获得。

Source: FOBs are field bases and as such, offer fewer capabilities than military bases, and their armory and equipment assortment is limited to resistance assets. However, they can be established very early, before the resistance is strong enough to overtake a military base, and/or may be placed in very advantageous locations.

They are somewhat complementary to FOBs, as they offer more possibilities at the cost of their fixed placement.
Fighters will find here regular army equipment of the allied forces and more construction options.

FOBs can be established by resistance members using the entrenchment tool, via the placement menu. They need to be placed at a sufficient distance from enemy-controlled facilities, towns and other points of interest. You can use FOB Placement map tool to plan the location in advance.
There are two types of operating bases, as described below.
Translation: 作战基地分为两种类型，如下所述。

Source:
Military bases are existing locations in the world, controlled by the enemy. After they are taken over,
they can be used as operating bases.

Operating bases are locations in which resistance members can construct buildings and fortifications, store resources, operate garages, repair and refuel vehicles, and more. If enough resources are stored, an operating base may be used as a respawn location.
Translation: 作战基地是抵抗成员可建造建筑和防御工事、储存资源、操作车库、维修和加油车辆等的地点。如果储存了足够资源，作战基地可用作重生点。

Source: Repair stations allow to repair vehicles of relevant category. To repair ground vehicles, build a vehicle maintenance ramp. To repair helicopters, build a service helipad. Follow base game mechanics to carry out the repairs - equip yourself with a wrench and approach the damaged elements until you see a relevant action. The repairs will consume resources stored at the location.
Translation: 修理站允许维修相应类别的车辆。要维修地面车辆，建造车辆维护坡道；要维修直升机，建造服务直升机停机坪。按照基础游戏机制进行维修——携带扳手并接近受损部件，直到出现相关操作提示。维修将消耗存放在该地点的资源。

Source: As the resources for construction are pulled from the base pool, the first supply storage in a base can be constructed without spending any resources.
Translation: 由于建造所需资源从基地资源池中提取，基地中第一个储物建筑可在不消耗任何资源的情况下建造。

Source: Resources in storage are persistent and do not expire or decay.
Translation: 储物中的资源是持久的，不会过期或衰减。

Source: Storages are always the first construction to be raised in an operating base. They store resources of different types and make them available to use within a base. Different to base game supply system, resources in Freedom Fighters are not vicinity based and cannot be used directly from trucks and other sources.
Translation: 储物建筑始终是作战基地中最先建造的设施。它们存储不同类型的资源，并使其可在基地内使用。与基础游戏的物资系统不同，自由战士中的资源不依赖于附近环境，不能直接从卡车或其他来源使用。

Source: Depending on your difficulty settings, you may see a status icon denoting whether your character is perceived as a combatant.
Translation: 根据你的难度设置，你可能会看到一个状态图标，表示你的角色是否被视为战斗人员。

Source: The absence of a shirt, pants, or boots will cause your character to attract enemy attention. After all, someone running around in only their underwear is bound to look suspicious.
Translation: 缺少衬衫、裤子或靴子会引起敌人注意。毕竟，光着内衣乱跑的人肯定会显得可疑。

Source: Appearance reflects how your character is perceived by others and depends on all worn attire and held items. Wearing any piece of military clothing will cause your character to be identified as a combatant. This means enemies will shoot on sight and mark you as wanted — the same applies to openly carrying any type of weapon.
As the base game does not contain any civilian backpacks, the general purpose military ones are not treated as military equipment.
Translation: 由于基础游戏中没有民用背包，一般用途的军用背包不被视为军用装备。

Source: Battles occur when control over a certain point of interest is contested. When a battle is won, the contesting faction takes control. Refer to the specific location description to learn how to provoke a battle. Only one battle can be active at any given moment and its progress cannot be saved. If the game is closed during a battle, the battle will need to be started from the beginning. Battle length and intensity depend on the number of players online, campaign progress, location significance, and threat level.
Each battle consists of two phases:
Translation: 每场战斗分为两个阶段：

Source:
- Deployment phase - The enemy is still deploying onto the battlefield. The progress bar is yellow and represents how much of their forces are already fielded. Once the bar completes, the battle will transition into domination phase.
- Domination phase - The sides fight for control. The progress bar is green and represents resistance control over the location. Control will increase every few moments if there are more freedom fighters in the contested area than enemies in the near vicinity.
If there are no freedom fighters in the contested area, the resistance will begin to rapidly lose control. In this case, the progress bar will turn red. Once the bar fills, the battle will be lost.
Translation: 如果争夺区域内没有自由战士，抵抗力量将迅速失去控制权，此时进度条会变为红色，一旦填满，战斗将失败。

Source: Once a battle begins, everyone will see a notification. A progress bar will appear at the top of the screen, accompanied by the location name. The battle location will also be marked on the map, denoting the contested area by a stripe pattern.

- Civilian shops will not serve you
- Resistance representatives may not want to talk to you
- Public transport becomes unavailable
- Resting becomes unavailable
- ...and more.

Various activities may cause your character to become wanted. This means your character is actively hunted by enemy forces and will be shot on sight, even if you appear as a civilian. Being wanted also has many negative side effects, such as:

Heat level is a measure of how much your character is wanted by the enemy. Once it drops to 0, you will no longer be wanted. Heat decreases over time as long as you stay out of sight of enemy troops. Your current heat level is represented by the fill level of the wanted status icon in the HUD. The time required to fully lose maximum heat depends on your difficulty settings.
If your character dies, the heat level and wanted state does not transfer to your new character.
Translation: 如果你的角色死亡，通缉值和通缉状态不会转移到新角色。

Source: Visible if your character is considered a combatant. This is caused by carrying weapons, using military vehicles, and wearing military attire — or wearing no attire at all.
Visible if your character is within an illegal area.
Translation: 如果角色在非法区域，此图标可见。

Source: Visible when your character is within enemy sight. Pulling out weapons, acting suspiciously, or committing crimes is not the best idea.
Visible if your character is wanted. Its fill level represents how much heat your character has, which reduces over time as you remain hidden.
Translation: 如果角色被通缉，此图标可见。填充量表示热度，随着隐蔽时间增加而减少。

Source: Visible if your character is undercover, which means it's impersonating an enemy soldier.
Translation: 角色为卧底时可见，即假扮敌军士兵。

Source: Visible if your character has been detected as a threat and is within enemy sight. If you are at a distance, concealed, or in the dark, it will take longer for the enemies to recognize you. When this happens, the icon will gradually fill up, giving you a brief chance to hide.

Character status is indicated by various icons shown on the HUD in the upper-right corner of the screen. Depending on your difficulty settings, some of the indicators listed below may not be displayed in your game.

You can command a squad using the vanilla commanding system. Your subordinates are persistent and in multiplayer sessions enter and exit the game with you. If your character dies, your squad will become detached. Any player, including you, can take command over a detached fighter by approaching them and using an action. Therefore, you can regain command if you return to your former squad with a new character quickly enough. A detached squad will disappear if there is no one nearby for a certain time.

Placeable objects are smaller props that are paid for in money by the placing person. If an item can be owned, it will be automatically linked to the person placing it (for example: item storages). Right now placed items cannot be moved or removed.

Construction includes placement of various items in the world and building structures. Both these actions are available via radial menu, but will only appear if your character is equipped with an entrenching tool. Moreover, construction is only possible at operating bases controlled by the resistance.

Buildable structures cost resources, which are taken from the location storage. Right now raised structures cannot be moved or removed. Structures belong to the resistance in general and are not linked to the specific person constructing them.

There are many areas that are forbidden to enter for civilians. Any players spotted in these areas will be instantly shot and hunted. Depending on your settings, these areas will be marked in red on your map and/or you will see a status icon on your HUD upon entering them. There is no need to frantically check your map to avoid entering them by accident - they are usually fenced and accompany military bases, outposts, factories, and other military or strategic points of interest.
Military personnel is allowed to be present within illegal zones. You can disguise yourself in enemy uniform to walk around freely.
Translation: 军人被允许出现在非法区域中。你可以通过伪装成敌方制服来自由行动。

Source: If you are extremely desperate, you can try extorting defenceless civilians. This should be your last resort, as it turns them hostile against you and makes you lose their hard-earned support.
Translation: 如果你极度缺钱，可以尝试勒索无助的平民。但这应作为最后手段，因为它会使平民转为敌对，并导致你失去他们辛苦获得的支持。

Source: Money makes the world go around and it is no different in *Freedom Fighters*. You will need it to buy gear, supplies, hire subordinates and expand your bases. Amount of possessed money can be checked at any moment by opening the inventory menu.

Your money is virtual, which means there is no in-game wallet item and your balance is tied to your player profile. What happens with your balance in case of your character death depends on your difficulty settings - ranging from no penalty, through fixed fee, to a complete loss.
Translation: 你的金钱是虚拟的，这意味着游戏中没有钱包物品，你的余额绑定在玩家档案上。角色死亡时余额的处理取决于难度设置——从无惩罚、固定费用到完全失去不等。

Source:
Earning methods
There are multiple ways to make money, but collecting enemy dogtags and turning them in to the resistance is the most rewarding one. You can also sell equipment looted from the enemy.
You can select the currency used in your run during game setup. Selected currency format has no effect on the gameplay and is purely a cosmetic/role-playing change.
Translation: 在游戏设置中，你可以选择使用的货币类型。所选货币格式不会影响游戏玩法，仅为美观或角色扮演效果。

Source:
Transferring
You can transfer money to another freedom fighter by accessing the radial menu and selecting the Transfer money option. To do so, you need to be in the immediate vicinity of the recipient. After money is sent, the transferee will receive a notification mentioning the sender name and amount of money received.

To acquire ownership over an item, it must have no prior owner. In that case, you will see a Claim ownership action on the item. Just use it to claim the item as your own. If you are placing objects and the object can be owned, you will automatically claim ownership over it.

Various items in the world can be owned by freedom fighters — such as containers placed in operating bases and vehicles found in the world. The owner can lock the item, restricting other players' access. Both lock state and ownership is persisted. This is useful if you want to keep your personal belongings secure, or make sure no reckless driver hijacks your valuable vehicle at a resistance base.

Sometimes you may also want to pass the ownership to another player, for example if you are building containers for your squad. In that case you can use Abandon ownership action to release the item. Afterwards, it can be claimed by any other player. Abandoning the item will also automatically unlock it.
Translation: 有时你可能想将所有权转交给其他玩家，例如为小队建造容器。这时可使用放弃所有权操作释放物品，之后其他玩家即可声明所有权。放弃物品也会自动解锁它。

Source:
Basic features available via the radial menu include:
- Accessing journal, containing details about your current tasks
- Accessing campaign progress menu, which lists your high-level objectives required to win the uprising
- Transferring money to nearby freedom fighters
- Accessing placing and construction menus
- Accessing placing and construction menus

Open the radial menu by pressing U to access various features specific to *Freedom Fighters*. This menu is context-aware, which means the options available within the menu may depend on your character state, objects in your vicinity, equipped tools and other. When additional options are available, you will usually see an on-screen prompt in the lower part of your screen.

You can use any handheld radio to communicate with the resistance. To do so, you must equip the radio in hand and interact with it using the radial menu. You will see a call to action when the interaction is available. Remember to turn the radio on and tune it to required frequency. You also need to be within range of a controlled radio site.

After joining the fight for the first time, or after an unfortunate death, the player will be faced with the deployment map tool. In this view, they can select the respawn location they wish to use. If there is no location available, the player has to wait until remaining players reenable respawn availability. If there are no remaining players alive, the campaign will fail.

To spawn in a town, there must be at least one supporter in the local population. By spawning, the player takes control of a civilian character that is taken away from the supporters amount. Town population is not affected by this.

Spawning at operating bases consumes a certain amount of resources, depending on the operating base type. Respawn cost, along with available resources at the base, is always shown in the deployment map tool.
Spawned character will have a mix of resistance clothes and no equipment at all.
Translation: 生成的角色将穿着混合的抵抗服装且没有任何装备。

Source: Spawned character will have civilian clothes, a basic handgun, a map and some bag.
Translation: 生成的角色将穿着平民服装，持有基础手枪、地图和一些背包。

Source: You can use most beds found in the world to rest. Resting advances time, which is useful if you want to skip night-time or, to the contrary, you want to carry out an assault in the dark.
Translation: 你可以使用世界中大多数床位进行休息。休息会推进时间，这对于跳过夜晚或相反进行夜间突袭非常有用。

Source:
Additionally:
- Character cannot be wanted
- If character is in combat attire, there cannot be enemies nearby
- Bed cannot be in illegal area

To rest, you have to interact with a bed and select resting duration in the menu. In multiplayer, all players spawned in-world need to get near beds and confirm their readiness to rest. It is not possible to change planned rest duration while players are waiting. To do so, all players must cancel their readiness (or exit resting menu), which will clear currently planned rest.
Translation: 要休息，需与床互动并在菜单中选择休息时长。在多人游戏中，所有生成在世界的玩家都需靠近床并确认准备休息。玩家等待期间无法更改计划的休息时长。如需更改，所有玩家必须取消准备（或退出休息菜单），以清除当前计划的休息时间。

Source: Once all required players are ready, a timelapse will occur, fast-forwarding by the selected duration.
Each player needs to have a wristwatch in order to wake up at the planned time.
Translation: 每位玩家需要拥有一块手表以便按计划时间醒来。

Source:
Depending on your difficulty settings, resting may heal player characters.
Damage is healed in full, independently of the rest duration.
Depending on your difficulty settings, you will see a status icon when your character is undercover.

By wearing complete enemy uniform your character can go undercover. In this state, you can enter illegal areas, openly carry weapons (if the weapon belongs to the enemy faction), and drive enemy vehicles without attracting attention. The cover can be blown if you act suspiciously or open fire.

When starting a new game, you can modify various settings to adjust the difficulty and mechanics to your play style. Although these are collectively called difficulty settings, some of the choices are rather a matter of preference. Right now those settings can only be adjusted when starting a new campaign.
Translation: 在开始新游戏时，你可以修改各种设置，以调整难度和游戏机制以符合你的玩法风格。虽然这些设置统称为难度设置，但其中一些选择更多是个人偏好。目前，这些设置只能在开启新战役时进行调整。

Source: You can quickly change all settings by selecting one of the predefined presets. Selecting a preset does not prevent you from adjusting the settings further - if you change any of the options, the preset selector will automatically switch to Custom, retaining all other settings from the preset. This way you can use any of the presets as a starting point.
Translation: 你可以通过选择预设方案快速更改所有设置。选择预设不会阻止你进一步调整设置——如果你更改了其中的任何选项，预设选择器将自动切换为自定义，并保留该预设中的其他所有设置。这样，你就可以将任意预设作为起点进行游戏调整。

Source: If this is your first playthrough, we recommend using Normal preset to experience a balanced gameplay the way it was envisioned.
Translation: 如果这是你的首次游玩，我们推荐使用普通预设，以体验设计者设想的平衡玩法。

Source: During pre game you can select faction configuration and multiple difficulty options. Setup and difficulty settings cannot be changed later. Ability to change difficulty settings during a campaign will be added in future.

If there is no saved data present, all joining players will see a pre game screen. If you are playing on a dedicated server, you need to log in as an admin to configure the game and launch it. This is automatic for single players and local hosts.
Translation: 如果没有存档数据，所有加入玩家将看到游戏前界面。如果在专用服务器上游戏，你需要以管理员身份登录以配置游戏并启动它。单人或本地托管自动完成该操作。

Source:
- player faction: the resistance faction. Irregular forces that will use a mix of their own and allied faction equipment.
- enemy faction: the occupier faction. Regular and organized army, controlling all significant points on the map, with no shortage of assets.
- allied faction: external power that supplies the resistance with political and military aid. Not directly present in the world, but the resistance may have access to some of its weapons and vehicles.
- civilian faction: the local population, present in towns and non-military facilities. Depending on world events, specific characters may become supporters of the resistance or occupier forces and become involved.
Translation:
- 玩家阵营：抵抗组织阵营。由不规则部队组成，使用自有及盟军阵营装备。
- 敌方阵营：占领军阵营。正规有组织的军队，控制地图上所有重要据点，资源充足。
- 盟军阵营：为抵抗组织提供政治和军事援助的外部势力。不会直接出现在世界中，但抵抗组织可能获得部分其武器和车辆。
- 平民阵营：本地居民，出现在城镇和非军事设施中。根据世界事件，特定角色可能成为抵抗组织或占领军的支持者并参与其中。

Source:
Other settings
You can also change the displayed format of the ingame currency to your liking. This is purely a cosmetic feature and has no impact on the actual gameplay mechanics.

Due to many additional features, Freedom Fighters is not automatically compatible with modded factions. In the base version, you can play as FIA, and choose between USA and USSR in allied and occupier faction roles. Support for outstanding community created factions will be added in future.
Translation: 由于许多附加功能，自由战士默认情况下不自动兼容模组阵营。在基础版本中，你可以扮演FIA，并在盟军和占领军阵营中选择USA或USSR。对社区创建的优秀阵营的支持将在未来加入。

Source: Whether you launch via single player scenario, host a local server or set up a dedicated server, new Freedom Fighters game is started using an ingame UI. All three playing methods are supported. Moreover, you can freely switch between single player and a locally hosted server - your campaign progres will carry over seamlessly.

Vehicles found in the world are not persistent by default - regardless whether you capture them on the go, or hijack from a parking spot. To preserve a vehicle during save/load, you have to assign it to a parking spot in a garage or a helipad at a controlled operating base.

Freedom Fighters is a semi-persistent scenario, which means that overall game progress is saved, but not the exact state of the world. Global save is performed periodically every 10 minutes to protect players from losing progress due to a fatal crash, and on every server exit (or closing the game in single player). In multiplayer, the player profile is saved on player disconnect.

If your character dies, their body will be persisted after you disconnect or exit, enabling you to return to it. But if you lose your next character, the previous body will be removed - only the last body is preserved.
Translation: 若角色死亡，其尸体将在你断开或退出后持续存在，使你可以返回。但如果你失去下一个角色，之前的尸体将被移除——仅保留最后一具尸体。

Source: This means that every fight counts and you can effectively clear garrisons by war of attrition, small chunks at a time.
Translation: 这意味着每场战斗都至关重要，你可以通过消耗战和逐步清理小规模兵力，有效清理驻防点。

Source: Claiming ownership of a vehicle does not affect its persistence.
Your AI subordinates are saved with your character. In multiplayer they will join and leave the server with you.
Translation: 你的AI下属会与角色一同保存。在多人游戏中，他们会随你加入或离开服务器。

Source: If you abandon a vehicle in the world and get sufficiently far away, it may be gone once you get back! Assigning the vehicle to a parking spot also prevents this. Additionally, you will be able to recover the vehicle from far away.
Translation: 如果你在世界中弃置车辆并离开足够远，返回时可能已经消失！将车辆分配到停车位也可防止此情况。此外，你可以从远处取回车辆。

Source: Your character position and inventory is fully saved. On return you will spawn at the same location you have exited, so make sure to exit the game while in a safe location!
Translation: 你的角色位置和物品栏将被完整保存。返回时，你将从退出时的位置生成，因此请确保在安全地点退出游戏！

Source: Specific enemy characters are not saved, so if you exit the game while surrounded by enemies, they will be gone after you load the game. Garrison compositions are however saved, which means if you attack a place of interest and eliminate a single enemy, that specific character will not automatically reappear. If you clear a location, but do not capture it, it will remain empty after the load - of course, unless enemy reinforcements arrive!
Translation: 特定敌方角色不会被保存，因此如果在被敌人包围时退出游戏，加载后他们将消失。然而，驻防编成会被保存，这意味着如果你攻击兴趣点并消灭单个敌人，该特定角色不会自动重新出现。如果清理一个地点但未占领，它在加载后仍将为空——当然，除非敌方增援到达！

Source: Getting supplies becomes much easier once you've captured your first factory. It will passively produce new supplies each day, which you can transport to your FOBs, hideouts, or donate to towns. Factories continue production even when you skip time by resting in beds, so you can use this mechanism at moments of downtime. You should now focus on capturing additional factories to maximize your production throughput.
Translation: 一旦夺取首个工厂，补给获取将更容易。工厂每天会被动生产新物资，可运送至FOB、藏身点或捐赠给城镇。即使通过床休息跳过时间，工厂仍会继续生产，可利用此机制度过空闲时间。你现在应关注夺取更多工厂，以最大化生产产量。

Source: Once you clear the garrison and enter the factory area, a battle will begin. Thanks to your hideout network, friendly fighters should arrive to help even the odds. If your character is killed, you'll be able to quickly respawn at your FOB, grab a vehicle, and return to the battle before it's lost.
Translation: 清除驻防并进入工厂区域后，将开始一场战斗。凭借你的藏身点网络，友军战士应会赶来支援，平衡战局。若角色死亡，可快速在FOB重生，取车返回战场。

Source: Now you're ready to capture an enemy factory. Choose one near your FOB, or establish a new one. Make sure it's stocked with weapons, ammunition, and medical items - either bring them manually or provide enough supplies so they can be purchased from the armory, medical tent, or other facilities. Set up a garage and park at least two vehicles. Whether you're playing solo or with others, you can also build a living area to command a squad of recruits during the assault.
Translation: 现在，你已准备好夺取敌方工厂。选择靠近FOB的工厂，或建立新的。确保其储备有武器、弹药和医疗物资——可手动运送，或提供足够物资以便从军械库、医疗帐篷或其他设施购买。建立车库并停放至少两辆车辆。无论单人还是多人游戏，你还可以建造居住区以指挥小队进行突袭。

Source: Your next priority should be to establish a network of hideouts across all towns. To do this, you need to increase support in each of them. Don't focus on a single location - instead, spread your efforts: hang posters in town A, donate supplies in town B, move on to town C, and eventually return to A. This rotation helps avoid diminishing returns and keeps the threat level moderately low.

Once you have a steady surplus of supplies, you can start taking over towns and military bases using the same process - ultimately leading to the liberation of all territories and victory in the campaign.

Every new hideout will make your life a little easier - reducing travel time to resupply, pick up posters, or report mission progress. Once your hideouts are established, stock them with supplies, including your HQ. Resupplied hideouts enable the resistance to dispatch fighters who can assist in capturing key points of interest.
Translation: 每新增一个藏身点都会让你的行动更轻松——减少补给、取海报或报告任务进度的路程。一旦藏身点建立，补充物资，包括你的HQ。补给充足的藏身点可让抵抗组织派遣战士协助夺取关键点。

Source: Start by completing the introductory storyline. By the end of it, you should have established your first FOB and learned how to earn money by collecting enemy dogtags, as well as how to raise support by hanging propaganda posters.
Translation: 首先完成入门剧情。完成后，你应建立第一个FOB并学会通过收集敌方身份牌赚钱，以及如何通过张贴宣传海报提高支持度。

Source:
Placing posters and talking to people may not be enough in towns with larger populations. The most effective method is donating supplies, which at this point can be obtained in one of the following ways:
- Purchase with money at ports: Earn money by turning in dogtags, completing resistance missions, or selling loot at shops.
- Raid an enemy factory: Go in guns blazing, or infiltrate undercover and casually drive off with the cargo.
- Ambush enemy transports: Enemy trucks may carry varying amounts of supplies.
- Loot enemy checkpoints: Occasionally, you may find a pile of supplies nearby.
Translation:
在人口较多的城镇，仅靠张贴海报和交谈可能不足。最有效的方法是捐赠物资，此时可通过以下方式获得：
- 在港口用金钱购买：通过上缴身份牌、完成抵抗任务或在商店出售战利品赚取金钱。
- 突袭敌方工厂：全力开火突入，或潜入伪装悄悄带走货物。
- 伏击敌方运输：敌方卡车可能携带不同数量的物资。
- 掠夺敌方检查站：偶尔可在附近找到一堆物资。

Source: Proceed to the factory and clear the enemy garrison. You'll likely face heavy resistance, but you can tackle it in stages. If you're playing solo, consider using a sniper rifle to harass enemies from a distance, frequently changing position to avoid detection. In other situations, a frontal assault with AI squadmates may be effective.

In the meantime, consider capturing radio and radar sites, which will help you consolidate your control over territory. This makes traveling safer, as enemy patrols will only appear in zones still under their control.
Translation: 与此同时，可考虑占领无线电和雷达站点，帮助巩固对领土的控制。这使得旅行更安全，因为敌方巡逻仅会出现在仍受其控制的区域。

Source: Make sure to have at least one dose of epinephrine on you. It can be self-administered if you get downed, which is crucial for lone wolves.

Do not get into a fight if you don't have a way out. Situation usually escalates very quickly and you may find yourself surrounded and overwhelmed, even if you had the upper hand at the start. Have an exit strategy and don't be afraid to break contact. You can always come later and try again.
Bloodied clothes will make you wanted on sight. If your clothes are bloodied, you will see a hint on the inventory screen.
Translation: 血迹斑斑的衣服会让你一出现就被通缉。如果你的衣服上有血迹，你将在物品栏界面看到提示。

Source: You can use public payphones to report resistance activity and lure the enemy into an ambush, or provoke a battle.
Translation: 你可以使用公共电话亭报告抵抗活动，引诱敌人入陷阱，或挑起战斗。

Source: You can also steal supplies from an enemy factory without capturing it. Likewise, create distraction, drive up in an enemy cargo truck while disguised, load supplies and get away quickly!
Translation: 你也可以在不占领敌方工厂的情况下偷取物资。同样，可以制造干扰，伪装成敌方身份开着敌方货车载运物资并快速撤离！

Source: You can purchase civilian clothes in a clothing shop. It may be useful to store a few sets at your military base, so you can disguise as a civilian after respawning.
Translation: 你可以在服装店购买平民衣物。将几套衣服存放在你的军事基地可能会很有用，这样在重生后你可以伪装成平民。

Source: You can capture enemy APCs or helicopters in the early game. Scout the location and ask for distraction at the other side of the enemy compound. Disguise yourself in enemy uniform to enter the illegal zone freely and hijack the vehicle, while everyone's attention is elsewhere.
Translation: 你可以在游戏早期捕获敌方装甲运兵车（APC）或直升机。先侦查目标位置，然后请求在敌方基地另一侧制造干扰。穿上敌方制服进入非法区域，自由接近并劫持车辆，同时确保其他人注意力集中在别处。

Source: Before trying to capture an enemy base, build a FOB nearby and stock it with resources to respawn there. Place a garage and assign a vehicle that will act as a taxi. Even if your entire squad dies and the vehicle stays left on the battlefield, you will be able to recover it remotely from the FOB. In this manner you will be able to deliver reinforcements sustainably.
Translation: 在尝试夺取敌方基地前，在附近建立FOB并储备重生所需物资。放置车库并分配一辆车辆作为交通工具。即使整个小队阵亡且车辆留在战场上，你仍可从FOB远程取回。如此，你将能够持续派遣增援。

Source: Enemy garrisons will usually outnumber you or your group, but don't worry - every attack and every eliminated enemy counts, and eventually you will win the war of attrition. Apply hit & run tactics - approach a base, snipe a few enemies, send a rocket and vanish in the woods. Rinse and repeat.
Translation: 敌方驻军通常人数多于你或你的队伍，但不要担心--每次攻击，每个被消灭的敌人都是计数的，最终你会赢得消耗战。使用“打了就跑”战术--接近基地，狙击几名敌人，发射火箭然后消失在树林中。重复此操作。

Source: Make sure to stock your hideouts fully before attempting to capture a town or a military base. The supplies will allow friendlies to take part in the battle.
Translation: 在尝试占领城镇或军事基地之前，请确保你将据点的物资储备充分。物资将允许友军参与战斗。

Source: You can use any handheld radio to contact the resistance officer if you are within signal range of a controlled radio site. Remember to tune your radio to correct frequency according to the timetable.
The HQ will be shut down and moved to a new location if you endanger it. Any stocked supplies will be lost in the process, wasting the resistance efforts.
Translation: 如果你危及总部，总部将被关闭并迁移到新地点。任何存储的物资都将丢失，浪费抵抗组织的努力。

Source: Passing ambulances may contain significant amounts of medical items, including epinephrine, in their trunks. Medics may also carry epinephrine.
Translation: 经过的救护车车厢中可能包含大量医疗物资，包括肾上腺素。医护人员也可能携带肾上腺素。

Source: At any point, you can check your campaign progress using the radial menu accessed by and selecting the appropriate option. Note that total progress includes optional objectives, not required for victory, therefore it is possible to finish the campaign without reaching 100% completion.

The resistance will be defeated if no freedom fighter is alive, and there is no respawn location available in the world. This can be caused by lack of resources, lack of population support, being overrun with enemies, or other reasons depending on the respawn location type. Look up Respawn in FM to learn more.
Translation: 如果世界上没有任何自由战士存活，且没有可用的重生点，抵抗组织将会被击败。这可能由资源不足、人口支持不足、被敌人压制，或根据重生点类型的其他原因导致。请查阅《作战手册》（FM）中的重生章节以了解更多信息。

Source: Freedom Fighters is an open-world campaign, but not open-ended. There are specific conditions in which your uprising will either achieve victory or defeat. When this happens, the campaign will end and you will have to start all over.
Translation: 自由战士是一场开放世界的战役，但并非开放结局。存在特定条件决定起义是 胜利还是 失败。发生这种情况时，战役将结束，你必须重新开始。

Source:
In order to reach victory, the resistance has to have control over or neutralize all of the following points of interest:
- towns
- factories
- military bases
- radio towers
- radar sites
Only with all of the above will the resistance have enough political and military power to upkeep its rule.

Population support is required indirectly to finish the campaign. Without it, you won't be able to control all required points of interest. It counts towards the progress, so you need to convince every single person to reach 100%.
Translation: 民众支持是完成战役的间接需求。没有它，你无法控制所有关键点。它计入进度，因此需说服每个人达到100%。

Source: Each supporter will donate a small amount of money to the resistance every day. The funds are then split equally and sent to all present freedom fighters automatically.
Translation: 每个支持者每天都会向抵抗组织捐赠少量资金。这些资金会被自动平分并分配给所有在场的自由战士。

Source: You can inspect general population stats in the campaign progress menu. To check local trends, inspect selected town on the map. Population composition is represented by a progress bar, with color-coded segments proportional to the popularity of relevant stance.
Translation: 你可以在“战役进度”菜单中查看整体人口统计。要查看本地趋势，可在地图上检查选定城镇。人口构成用进度条表示，条形颜色与相关立场的受欢迎程度成比例。

Source: Population moods will change in reaction to your actions. While civilians are rather tolerant to acts of war and inconveniences caused by combat against the occupier, any wrongdoings towards them will turn them hostile very quickly. Keep in mind your supporters may become hostile just as well, negating your hard-earned friendliness.
Translation: 人口情绪会根据你的行动发生变化。虽然平民对战争行为和针对占领者的战斗所带来的不便相对宽容，但任何对他们的不当行为都会迅速使他们变得敌对。请记住，你的支持者也可能变为敌对，从而抵消你辛苦争取的友好度。

Source:
Civilian population is a key element in your revolution. After all, it is their freedom you are fighting for. Just incidentally they also happen to fuel your efforts with money and manpower. Each civilian may have one of the following stances regarding revolution:
- supporting: friendly to the resistance members and disapproving of the occupier.
- neutral: no stance, the initial state for most of the population. They don't really care about the revolution or the occupier forces. They can be turned into supporters, given enough reasons to.
- hostile: actively against the revolution and supporting the occupier. They cannot be turned into supporters, but given enough time they may become neutral.

Donating supplies is a rather expensive method, unless you have a surplus of your own production. Supplies are also vital to your own operations, so giving them away in the early stages of the revolution may not be the best choice.

There is no limit as to how many supplies and how often you can donate to a specific town, but many donations over a short period of time will stop having an effect on the support. It's best to diversify and distribute the supplies evenly to many towns in a concurrent manner. Donation effects wear out after some time, so you can come back and donate another shipment later.

Load your vehicle with supplies and drive to the exact location of the town marker, as shown on your map. Come to a full stop once you are within 50 meters from the marker. A prompt should appear, and the donation option will be available in the radial menu.

Free stuff is an excellent method to gain supporters, whether you are a politician, or… a politician-to-be. If you win the revolution, of course. The downside is that you actually have to bring the stuff to the table. But here comes the good news - when it's free, nobody will ask you how you got it.

Once convinced to support the resistance, civilians will not change their mind on their own. Remember that each supporter can still turn hostile if you give them a good enough reason to. Opposite to supporters, civilians will typically turn hostile immediately in response to your actions. In that case, there is nothing you can do to change their mind except for waiting.
Translation: 一旦被说服支持抵抗组织，平民不会自行改变主意。但请记住，如果你给他们充分的理由，每个支持者仍可能转而敌对。与支持者相反，平民通常会立即对你的行为做出敌对反应。在这种情况下，除了等待之外，你无法改变他们的想法。

Source: There is a trade-off however, as the amount of posters - and thus the support you can generate this way - is limited. As the posters are meant to be visible - they are also visible to enemy forces too, and will raise the local threat level.
Distributing propaganda is a crime, and doing it within enemy sight will make you wanted.
Translation: 散发宣传属于犯罪行为，在敌方视线范围内进行会使你成为通缉目标。

Source: Posters can be obtained from resistance officers using the relevant dialogue option.

Placing up posters is a very effective early method to raise awareness about your revolution and gain support. It's more time-effective than personal agitation, as you can reach many people with a single poster.

To place a poster, you need to equip it in your left hand (just like any other item). You will see a ghost of the poster in front of you. The ghost color will change to gray if the placement is valid, and yellow if it cannot be placed.
Translation: 要张贴海报，你需要将其装备在左手（就像其他物品一样）。你会在前方看到海报的虚影。如果可以放置，虚影颜色会变为灰色；如果无法放置，则为黄色。

Source: Postering all spots is not required to finish the campaign, but is required to reach 100% completion.
Translation: 并非所有地点都必须张贴海报才能完成战役，但要达到100%完成度则必须覆盖所有地点。

Source: Posters can only be attached to specific objects (usually boards, signs, cabinets, advertising columns and similar), which are marked on your map with a posterable icon. Once an item has been postered, the icon is removed.

Gaining support is a process which takes time. Most actions will not yield immediate results, but will resonate over time instead. For example, if you place posters, it takes some time for them to be noticed. If you donate supplies, it takes some time for the word to spread around, and so on. You can inspect towns on the map to view currently active effects and their expiration time. Once an effect expires, it will stop attracting new supporters and will be removed.

There are multiple ways to gain support, including:
- direct agitation by approaching and talking to individual persons
- placing up propaganda posters to increase visibility and awareness
- donating supplies to townsfolk
Some methods are described in detail in their dedicated Field Manual pages.
Translation: 部分方法在专门的野外手册页面中有详细说明。

Source: Factories are crucial for your revolution, as they can provide a steady stream of resources, which are much needed for any war efforts.
Translation: 工厂对你的革命至关重要，因为它们可以提供稳定的资源流，这对于任何战争行动都非常必要。

Source: Each factory controlled by the resistance will produce certain resources, depending on the factory type. Those resources may then be freely utilized by freedom fighters as deemed fit. On each factory area there is at least one resource storage, in which the produced resources are placed. Those storages are always marked on the map and feature a sign.

Factories are usually guarded by an enemy forces garrison. Once the garrison is cleared and the area is secured, a battle will follow. Be careful, as during factory working hours civilian workers will be present in the factory area. After repelling enemy forces the resistance will take control over the factory. All factories must be controlled by the resistance in order to achieve victory.

Military bases are the backbone of enemy occupation over the area. All bases need to be controlled by the resistance to achieve victory, but be warned, they are heavily guarded and the enemy won't let control over them easily.
Translation: 军事基地是敌方占领该区域的支柱。抵抗组织必须控制所有基地才能取得胜利，但请注意，它们防守严密，敌人不会轻易放弃控制权。

Source: In order to take control, the resistance has to win a battle over the base. A battle can be initiated by interacting with the military base flag post.
Translation: 为了夺取控制权，抵抗组织必须赢得该基地的一场战斗。可以通过与军事基地旗杆互动来发起战斗。

Source: Once under resistance control, the military base becomes resistance's operating base, which means the resistance may start construction in its area. See relevant Field Manual section for more info.

Radar sites cannot be captured by the resistance, only neutralized. To do so, the resistance has to destroy all radar dishes present on the site. Even if the defending garrison is cleared without damage to the equipment, the resistance has no qualified crews to operate the installations.
Translation: 雷达站无法被抵抗组织占领，只能被中立化。为此，抵抗组织必须摧毁站点上的所有雷达天线。即使清理了防守驻军而设备未受损，抵抗组织也没有合格人员操作这些设施。

Source: Radar sites are operated by the enemy and need to be neutralized to achieve victory. With enemy radar sites in operation, allied forces are not able to provide required support.
Translation: 雷达站由敌方操作，需要被中立化以取得胜利。在敌方雷达站仍在运行时，盟军无法提供所需支援。

Source: Radio towers are always guarded by an enemy garrison. To take control, the resistance has to simply secure the area by clearing its garrison.
Translation: 无线电塔始终由敌方驻军守卫。要控制无线电塔，抵抗组织只需通过清除驻军来确保该区域安全。

Source: Radio towers are used to enable communication for the controlling faction and jam opposing forces. All radio towers need to be either neutralized or controlled by the resistance to achieve victory. Towers may be destroyed, in which case neither side will control it. This also counts towards campaign progress.
Translation: 无线电塔用于为控制阵营建立通信，同时干扰敌方力量。为了取得胜利，所有无线电塔都需要被抵抗组织中立化或控制。塔也可能被摧毁，在这种情况下双方都无法控制它。这同样计入战役进度。

Source: On the other hand, sometimes you may want to increase threat and provoke a response from the enemy deliberately, for example to contest town control. In this case, some warning shots in the air or an ambush on a random enemy vehicle should be enough. You can also locate the nearest phone booth and report resistance activity in the town.

Threat level denotes how much trouble the resistance has been recently making. The bigger the threat, the more activity from enemy forces you can expect. Killings, shootings, and even sightings of resistance fighters will rapidly increase threat. Threat will decay over time, so if you are facing too much enemy activity, it is best to change the area of operations for some time and come back later.
Translation: 威胁等级表示抵抗组织近期造成的麻烦程度。威胁越高，你可以预期更多敌方活动。杀戮、枪击，甚至抵抗战士的目击都会迅速增加威胁。威胁会随时间衰减，因此如果敌方活动过多，最好暂时更换作战区域，然后再回来。

Source: Towns are key places for your revolution. Most importantly, they are the home of the local population, whose support is desperately needed. Towns come in three sizes: villages, towns and cities, based on the number of residents and their infrastructure.

To control a town, the resistance has to have a certain amount of supporters among the town residents. Detailed information is always shown in the town info panel. Raising support is enough to control villages, but in the case of bigger settlements, enemy forces will not stay indifferent. When the town's threat level gets sufficiently high, the occupier will attempt to pacify the town and a battle will begin. As a result, the winning side will take control over the town.
Be wary that the resistance will lose control over a town if the population support falls below a certain threshold.

Friendly fighters are resistance members or supporting civilians that decided to take part in the fight. They will appear during battles over various points of interest, such as towns, military bases, factories and others. They are autonomous and you cannot directly control them, but they will fight along side you with the enemy. However, their presence depends on your actions, as each fighter needs to be equipped with weapons and ammunition, and that in turn requires supplies.
Translation: 友军战士是抵抗组织成员或决定参与战斗的支持平民。他们会在各类兴趣点的 战斗 中出现，例如城镇、军事基地、工厂等。他们是自主行动的，你无法直接控制，但会与你并肩作战。然而，他们的出现取决于你的行动，因为每名战士都需要配备武器和弹药，而这又需要 补给。

Source: Friendly fighters consume supplies stored at hideouts. If the location being fought for hosts a hideout - such as a town - then the fighters will appear and take supplies only from that specific hideout. Otherwise - when attacking factories or military bases - the supplies are consumed across all resistance hideouts, including the HQ. Supplies stored at resistance operating bases (FOBs, military bases) and controlled factories are not taken into account.
Translation: 友军战士消耗储存在 据点 的补给。如果争夺的地点设有据点——如城镇——战士将只从该据点获取补给。否则——在攻击工厂或军事基地时——补给将从所有抵抗据点（包括总部）中消耗。储存在抵抗操作基地（FOB、军事基地）和被控制工厂的补给不计入消耗。

Source: There is always one HQ hideout in the world. However, if you endanger it, it will cease operations and must be relocated. This process may take several hours, during which the HQ will be inaccessible. Any supplies stored there will be lost during the move, so take care to avoid triggering a relocation.
Translation: 世界上始终存在一个HQ藏身点。然而，如果你使其处于危险之中，它将停止运作并必须重新安置。这个过程可能需要数小时，在此期间HQ将无法访问。储存在其中的任何物资在搬迁过程中都会丢失，因此要小心避免触发重新安置。

Source: Hideouts are secure locations used by the resistance for meetings and covert communication. At each hideout, you can meet a resistance officer - your primary contact for all conspiratorial matters. Speak with them to receive new assignments. Keep in mind that they're not particularly fond of attracting attention from the authorities, so avoid visiting them when you have heat on you.
Translation: 藏身点是抵抗组织用于会议和秘密通讯的安全地点。在每个藏身点，你都可以见到一位抵抗官员——你处理所有阴谋事务的主要联系人。与他们交谈以接受新的任务。请记住，他们并不喜欢吸引当局注意，因此当你处于追捕状态时，避免访问他们。

Source: The resistance will establish hideouts in towns and cities once there is enough local support to sustain its operations. Same goes the other way - if you lose too much support, resistance operations will become unsustainable and the hideout will be dissolved. Keeping a network of hideouts is very important, as each additional hideout means more storage space for supplies, which are used to arm your fighters during battles.
Translation: 一旦在城镇和城市中获得足够的地方支持，抵抗组织将建立藏身点。反之亦然--如果你失去过多支持，抵抗行动将无法维持，藏身点将被解散。维持藏身点网络非常重要，因为每增加一个藏身点，就意味着更多的物资储存空间，这些物资用于在战斗中武装你的战士。

Source: HQ hideouts are established in safer locations - typically in remote houses away from densely populated areas or in small, secluded settlements. They serve as delivery and pickup points for various resistance operations and act as rally points where mercenary fighters can be recruited.
Translation: HQ（总部）藏身点通常建立在较为安全的地点——通常是远离人口密集区的偏僻房屋或小型隐蔽定居点。它们作为各种抵抗行动的投递与接收点，同时也是佣兵战士可以招募的集结点。

Source: The HQ's location is not automatically revealed on your map. To discover its position, you must either call the HQ using a phone or contact it via radio, and then travel to the coordinates you are given.
Translation: HQ的位置不会自动显示在你的地图上。要发现其位置，你必须通过电话联系HQ或使用无线电联络，然后前往你所获得的坐标。

Source: Hideout officers also offer guns, ammunition, and other war materials - all available in exchange for money.

Missions and their progress is, at any stage, fully persistent. It is a good idea to look up the journal upon joining an existing online session to check out if there are any already started missions.
Translation: 任务及其进度在任何阶段都是完全持久的。加入现有在线会话时，查看任务日志以了解是否已有任务在进行中，是个好主意。

Source: You can receive missions by talking to the resistance officer. Missions are shared by all ingame players and it does not matter which player takes or reports them. If the mission is awarded with money, the amount is automatically split between all ingame players.
Translation: 你可以通过与抵抗官员交谈来接收任务。任务由所有游戏内玩家共享，哪个玩家领取或上报任务都无关紧要。如果任务附带金钱奖励，该金额会自动在所有游戏内玩家之间分配。

Source: You can recruit resistance fighters at HQ hideouts existing in the world or living areas constructed by players at the resistance operating bases. Recruited fighters can be commanded as members of your squad.
Translation: 你可以在世界中的HQ藏身点或玩家在抵抗作战基地建造的居住区招募抵抗战士。招募的战士可以作为你小队成员被指挥。

Source: Phones can be used to make calls to known contacts using the phonebook, or by dialling a number manually. Once phone is interacted with, a radial menu will appear enabling to choose the preferred method.
Translation: 电话可用于通过电话簿拨打已知联系人，或手动输入号码拨打。与电话互动后，会出现环形菜单，可选择首选拨打方式。

Source: Once supplies are purchased, they will be placed in the pickup area. Don't worry if you can't haul all goods in one go - those supplies are secure and will be waiting for pickup after you return.
Translation: 购买物资后，它们将放置在提货区。如果一次无法全部搬运也无需担心——这些物资是安全的，回去后可继续提取。

Source: Ports can be used to import supplies from abroad, an essential resource representing various commodities essential both for everyday life and development of your facilities. Supplies can be bought for money after interacting with the storage area sign. Each port has a limited storage of supplies, but after a few days the stock should be replenished. Port storages are independent from each other and are refilled independently.
Translation: 港口可用于从海外进口物资，这是日常生活和设施发展所必需的各种资源。在与仓储区域标志互动后，可用金钱购买物资。每个港口的物资存储有限，但几天后库存应会补充。港口仓储相互独立，独立补货。

Source: To travel, you have to appear as a civilian and cannot be wanted.
Translation: 旅行时，你必须以平民身份出现，并且不能处于通缉状态。

Source: Public transport can be used to quickly travel around the map. You can use buses to travel on roads and ferries to navigate the water bodies. Every passenger has to buy a ticket each time they travel, price of which depends on the distance traveled. Sometimes certain stops may become temporarily unavailable, for example due to ongoing battles or administrative decisions of the authorities.
Translation: 公共交通可用于快速在地图上移动。你可以乘坐公交车在道路上行驶，乘坐渡轮穿越水域。每位乘客每次出行都必须购买车票，票价取决于行驶距离。有时某些站点可能暂时无法使用，例如因正在进行的战斗或当局行政决定。

Source: While item stocks are limited, they usually get replenished before next business day begins. Shops will not want to serve you if you are wanted. Also keep in mind the current time of day - each shop has specific business hours, outside of which you will not be served.
Translation: 虽然商品库存有限，但通常会在下一营业日前补充。若你处于通缉状态，商店不会为你服务。同时注意当前时间——每家商店都有特定营业时间，非营业时间无法购买。

Source: Various civilian shops can be found in the world, offering diverse assortment of goods. At general shops, you can buy various items intended for tourism, which are also incidentally useful if you plan to conduct guerilla warfare - such as compasses, watches or binoculars. Clothing shops may be useful if you want to get rid of your uniform and blend into the crowd. If you intend to be shot, make sure to visit the pharmacy beforehand.
Translation: 世界中有各种平民商店，提供多样商品。在综合商店，你可以购买旅游用品，这些物品在游击战中也有意外用途——例如指南针、手表或望远镜。服装商店可在你想脱掉制服混入人群时派上用场。如果打算开战，请先访问药店。

Source: Problems were detected with one or more of selected factions. Please report this problem to the integration author along with complete log files.
An unknown error occured. Check logs for details and report this to the mod authors.
Scenario or terrain validation failed. Please report this problem to the scenario author along with a full set of log files.

Please keep in mind this project is in an early access state. Some features may not be fully developed yet, or may be temporary or placeholders.

Be sure to check out your journal and the Field Manual so you don't get lost.

If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to join our Discord community by scanning the code.

Good luck!
Translation:
请注意，本项目处于抢先体验阶段。部分功能可能尚未完全开发，或可能是临时或占位内容。

务必查看你的任务日志和野战手册，以免迷路。

如有任何问题或反馈，欢迎扫描二维码加入我们的 Discord 社区。

祝你好运！

Translation: 通过将威胁等级提高到 %2% 并确保至少 %1% 的人口支持来发起战斗。

Source: Establish a hideout by raising population support to %1%.
Translation: 通过将人口支持提高到 %1% 来建立据点。

Source: Keep population support above %1% to maintain the hideout.
Translation: 保持人口支持高于 %1% 以维持据点。

The resistance failed to take control over %1.
Military radar site near %1 has been destroyed by the resistance.
Translation: 靠近 %1 的军事雷达站已被抵抗组织摧毁。

Source: The resistance has captured a radio tower near %1.
Translation: 抵抗组织已占领靠近 %1 的无线电塔。

Source: The resistance defended their control over %1.
Translation: 抵抗组织已防守并控制 %1。

Delivery job failed, the contact person is dead.
Delivery job failed, destination hideout disbanded.
The resistance cleared an enemy camp near %1.
Translation: 抵抗组织清除了靠近 %1 的敌军营地。

Source: The uprising started by %1 has been crushed. %2 remains under %3 control.
Translation: %1 发起的起义已被镇压。%2 仍受 %3 控制。

Source: %1 has won the uprising and took control over %2. Good job!
Translation: %1 赢得了起义并控制 %2。干得好！

Source: A new revolution has started. Rise up, people of %1!
Translation: 一场新的革命已开始。%1 的人民，奋起吧！

Source: The resistance hideout in %1 is back in operation.
Translation: %1 的抵抗据点已恢复运作。

Source: The resistance hideout in %1 has been shut down.
The resistance has established a new hideout in %1.
Translation: 抵抗组织在 %1 建立了新的据点。

Source: The resistance HQ near %1 has been shut down due to imminent danger.
Translation: 靠近 %1 的抵抗总部因迫在眉睫的危险已关闭。

Source: The resistance has established a new HQ hideout.
Translation: 抵抗组织建立了新的总部据点。

Source: The %1 HQ near %2 is shut down due to operator death.
Translation: 靠近 %2 的 %1 总部因操作员死亡已关闭。

Source: The resistance hideout in %1 is inoperable due to imminent danger.
Translation: %1 的抵抗据点因迫在眉睫的危险无法使用。

Source: The %1 hideout in %2 is shut down due to operator death.
Translation: %2 的 %1 据点因操作员死亡已关闭。

Source: The resistance failed to free any prisoners in a jailbreak attempt.
%1 has been destroyed by enemy forces.

Translation: %2 已由 %1 在 %3 附近建立。

Source: You receive %1 for completing the job.
Radio tower near %1 has been destroyed.
Translation: 靠近 %1 的无线电塔已被摧毁。
你已收到支持者提供的 %1。

Source: Inventory storage box with reasonable capacity for personal equipment. Can be locked to protect the items.
Translation: 用于个人装备的合理容量存储箱，可上锁保护物品。

Source: Placing the flag will establish a new operating base.
Translation: 放置旗帜将建立新的操作基地。

Source: The light can be switched on and off.
Basic building block of a defensive position.
Translation: 防御阵地的基本建筑块。

Source: Please wait for the server administrator to configure and start a new game. If you are the administrator, please log in by typing the command below into the chat.
Translation: 请等待服务器管理员配置并启动新游戏。如果你是管理员，请在聊天中输入以下命令登录。

Source: We encourage you to check out Field Manual to learn more about this game mode while you are waiting.
Translation: 我们建议你查看野战手册，在等待时了解更多游戏模式信息。

Source: Posters can be hanged in various places to increase civilian population support and increase visibility of the resistance.
Translation: 海报可挂在各处，提高平民支持并增加抵抗可见度。

Source: The radio tower has been destroyed and is inoperable.
Translation: 无线电塔已被摧毁，无法使用。

Source: Spawning at this camp will consume 1 tent.
You will spawn as a resistance fighter.
Respawning at this location will take %1 supplies.
Translation: 在此位置重生将消耗 %1 补给。

Source: Click on selected location to respawn.
Click to respawn at this location.
Respawn will reduce population support by %1.
Translation: 重生将使民众支持度下降1。

Source: You will spawn in civilian clothes, with a handgun and a map.
Translation: 你将穿平民服装，携带手枪和地图重生。

Source: This respawn location is not available due to ongoing battle.
Translation: 此重生点因战斗进行中而不可用。

Source: Cannot respawn while enemies are present at this location.
Translation: 敌人在此位置时无法重生。

Source: This respawn location is not available at the moment.
You need local population support to respawn at this location.
Translation: 你需要当地民众支持才能在此重生。

Source: No tents are available at this camp for respawn.
Spawning here requires at least %1 supplies in storage.
Translation: 在此重生需要至少 %1 补给储备。

Source: This location must be under resistance control to respawn.
Translation: 此位置必须在抵抗控制下才能重生。

Source: There are no items in your inventory to sell.
Translation: 库存中没有可出售物品。

Source: There are no items available for purchase.
You are a bunch of terrorists. You should be arrested.
Translation: 你们是一群恐怖分子，应被逮捕。

Source: The regime brought order, and you people just want chaos.
Translation: 政权带来了秩序，而你们只想制造混乱。

Source: I hope they find you. I'll be the one pointing the gun.
Translation: 希望他们找到你。我会指着枪。

Source: I stand with the ones who actually protect this place, not you.
Translation: 我支持真正保护这里的人，而不是你们。

Source: I'll make sure authorities learn about it.
Translation: 我会确保当局知晓此事。

Source: That just sounds like another way to die.
Translation: 听起来就是另一种死法。

Source: Change? That's a fairy tale. I'm just trying to stay alive.
Translation: 换吗？那是童话。我只是想活下去。

Source: Get lost. I don't need your cause or your problems.
Translation: 滚开。我不需要你的事业或麻烦。

Source: I'm not cut out for that kind of thing. Sorry.
I tried once. It didn't end well.
Translation: 我尝试过一次，结果不好。
加入你们？我可不想自杀。

Source: Already embedded. I just don't advertise it.
Translation: 我已经潜伏，只是不宣传。

Source: You're not the first to ask. I signed up a while ago.
Translation: 你不是第一个问的。我早就报名了。

Source: You guys seriously need to talk to each other. I'm with you.
Translation: 你们真的需要彼此沟通。我支持你们。

Source: You don't need to convince me. I've bled for this already.
Translation: 不必说服我。我已经为此流血。

Source: Count me in. It's time someone stood up to them.
Translation: 算我一个。该有人站出来对抗他们。
我受够了。让我们战斗吧。

Source: Tell your people I'm ready. Let's get to work.
Translation: 告诉你的人我准备好了。开始行动吧。

Source: I'm in. Just tell me what needs to be done.
Translation: 我加入。告诉我需要做什么。

Source: Hell yeah. Let's mess them up.
That supposed to scare me? Try harder.
I've got nothing for you, except regret.
Translation: 我除了遗憾什么都没有给你。

Source: Get lost, I'm not scared of you.
You're not the first to try.
Alright, alright! Just don't hurt me!
It was for my kid's medicine... but whatever. Take it.
Translation: 这是为了我孩子的药...但随便了。拿去吧。

Source: You are worse than the regime.
Fine, but you just lost a supporter.
Translation: 好吧，但你刚失去了一个支持者。

Source: I'm sure the resistance will pay back for this.
Translation: 我相信抵抗会为此报仇。

Source: You are just bandits in uniforms.
Translation: 你们只是穿制服的土匪。

Source: Wear some pants before you talk to me.
I'm not talking to naked strangers.
I have nothing to say to you.
Do you have something for me?
You look like someone who's had enough. Join us.
Translation: 你看起来受够了。加入我们吧。

Source: I have enough of these pigs. Are you in, or are you just surviving?
Translation: 我受够这些猪了。你加入还是只是生存？

Source: If you're tired of hiding, pick up a cause worth dying for.
Translation: 如果你厌倦了躲藏，就选择一个值得为之牺牲的事业。

Source: Not everyone's blind to what's going on. Some of us are doing something about it.
Translation: 不是每个人都对发生的事视而不见。有些人正在行动。

Source: Are you willing to make a difference? Because we are.
Translation: 你愿意改变现状吗？因为我们愿意。

Source: We've got fire, we've got purpose - all we're missing is you.
Translation: 我们有火、有目标--缺的只是你。

Source: You want change? You don't get it by sitting around. Join us.
Translation: 想要改变？坐着不动可达不到。加入我们。

Source: You sick of their boot on your neck? Then maybe it's time to push back.
Translation: 厌倦他们的脚踩在你脖子上？也许是时候反击了。

Source: Orders? We make our own now. Join us.
Translation: 命令？我们现在自己下命令。加入我们。

Source: There's a war coming whether you're ready or not. Best be on the right side.
Translation: 战争即将来临，无论你是否准备好。最好站在正确的一方。

Source: I'm not asking twice. Money, now.
Translation: 我不会重复两遍。钱，现在。

Source: You pay now, or you bleed later. Simple math.
Translation: 你现在付钱，否则之后流血。简单数学。

Source: Protection doesn't come free. Give me your money.
Translation: 保护不是免费的。把钱交出来。

Source: This is the part where you give me what I want.
Translation: 现在是你给我想要的东西的时候了。

Source: Last guy who said no is still chewing through a straw.
Translation: 上一个说“不”的人还在用吸管嚼东西呢。

Source: I'm ready to do whatever it takes to help our cause.
Translation: 我准备付出一切帮助我们的事业。

Source: Hey, we talked earlier. I want to join the fight.
Translation: 嘿，我们之前谈过。我想加入战斗。

Source: I have to pass this one to someone else.
This is not a job for me.
Get out of here, you are free.
I am getting you out of here.
Got any more of those posters?
There are people with guns, we're scared, can you send a patrol over here?
Translation: 有人持枪，我们害怕，你能派巡逻过来吗？

Source: More enemies are eating dirt. Here's proof.
Translation: 更多敌人倒下了。这是证据。

Source: So, you want to take it to the next level?
We are running an... um... incentive scheme of sorts.
Translation: 我们正在运行...嗯...一种奖励计划。

Source: Certain friends of our cause are offering money for every eliminated enemy soldier.
Translation: 我们事业的某些朋友会为每消灭一个敌军士兵提供奖金。

Source: They don't buy our word, but enemy dogtags are solid proof.
Translation: 他们不会相信我们的口头承诺，但敌军军牌是确凿证据。

Source: Bring me a handful of those if you're not joking around.
Translation: 带来一把这些，如果你不是开玩笑。

Source: Your next task is to set up a field operating base.
Translation: 你的下一个任务是建立一个前线作战基地。

Source: Pick a good spot for it. You can use your map to check which areas are too dangerous.
Translation: 选一个好位置。可用地图检查哪些区域过于危险。

Source: You'll need some money to kick it off. Oh, and don't forget a shovel.
Translation: 你需要一些钱启动哦，别忘了带铲子。

Source: Make sure you are not followed.
Very well then. But we need more people before we take up arms. Actually, there is something you can do for us.
Translation: 很好。但在我们拿起武器前，需要更多人。实际上，你可以帮我们做点事。

Source: Take this briefcase. I need you to deliver it to someone. Don't look inside.
You're calling just in time. Grab instructions from the dead drop at coordinates:
Translation: 你打电话正好。去坐标处的秘密投递点拿指示。

Source: Yes. Come visit me for further instructions.
Translation: 是的，来找我获取进一步指示。

Source: I'm glad you came. Take this note with instructions.
Translation: 我很高兴你来了。带上这张带指示的便条。

Source: Well done. I wish we had more like you in our ranks.
Translation: 干得好。希望我们阵营有更多像你一样的人。

Source: Report back to me in person after the job is done.
Translation: 任务完成后亲自向我汇报。

Source: Shame, I thought you were capable.
Think twice before you waste my time again.
I am not around. Reach me out when things get calmer.
Translation: 我不在。事情平静后再联系我。

Source: Not right now, but check back later.
Translation: 现在不行，但之后再来看看。

Source: We have to spread the word. Visit nearby towns and hang a bunch of revolutionary posters.
Translation: 我们必须传播消息。访问附近城镇，挂上大量革命海报。

Source: Look for cabinets, advertisement boards, signs and other things that attract attention.
Translation: 寻找橱柜、广告牌、标志和其他吸引注意的物品。

Source: This is illegal, make sure you are not seen putting these up, or at least don't get yourself killed.
Translation: 这是违法行为，确保没人看到你放置，或者至少不要丢了性命。

Source: You already have enough posters with you. It's too dangerous to carry more.
Translation: 你身上已有足够海报。携带更多太危险。

Source: I don't have any more left at the moment.
Make some space in your bag if you want the posters.
Translation: 如果想带海报，请先腾出包内空间。

Source: I was expecting you. Thanks for the delivery.
You've reached the Military Police post. How can I help you?
Translation: 你已到达军事警察岗。需要帮助吗？

Source: Hang tight, we will dispatch someone your way immediately.
Translation: 稍等，我们会立即派人过来。

Source: This vehicle type cannot be repaired at this support station.
Translation: 此类型车辆无法在此支援站维修。

Source: Curfew is in effect from %1 to %2.
